offences.wording: XXXX on the 1st day of June 2023 strangled Mariana CHUTOROG.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.
offences.offenceTitle: Assault by beating
offences.wording:
XXX between the 1st day of May 2023 and the 1st day of June 2023 
assaulted Mariana CHITOROG by beating her

hearings.publicListNote: DEFENDANT TO BE PRODUCED. ALL COUNSEL TO ATTEND. INTERPRETER BOOKED

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 16 of the Offences Against the Person Act 1861.
offences.offenceTitle: Threats to kill
offences.wording: XXXXX on the 15th day of October 2023 without lawful excuse made to Amea Chitty a threat to kill her intending that the said Amea Chitty would fear that the said threat would be carried out.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 7(3)(b), (4) and (5) of the Bail Act 1976.
offences.offenceTitle: Arrest by a constable for breaking / likely to break bail conditions - duty to surrender into the custody of a court
offences.wording: On or in 9 November 2023 at Colchester having been arrested by a constable for breaking a bail condition, namely NOT TO CONTACT DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY AMEA CHITTY SAVE THROUGH SOLICITORS,  SOCIAL SERVICES OR THE FAMILY COURT FOR CHILD CONTACT ARRANGEMENTS ONLY being a person released on 17/10/2023 by South Essex Magistrates Court being under a duty to surrender into the custody of a court

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 76(1) and (11) of the Serious Crime Act 2015.
offences.offenceTitle: Engage in controlling / coercive behaviour in an intimate / family relationship
offences.wording: XXXX between the 1st day of January 2017 and the 31st day of March 2023 at a time when he was personally connected to Amea Chitty engaged in behaviour towards her that was controlling or coercive which had a serious effect on her, namely that it caused Amea Chitty to fear violence on at least two occasions.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 47 of the Offences Against the Person Act 1861.
offences.offenceTitle: Assault a person thereby occasioning them actual bodily harm
offences.wording: XXXX on the 15th day of October 2023 assaulted Amea Chitty thereby occasioning her actual bodily harm.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 4A(1)(a)(b)(ii) and (5) of the Protection from Harassment Act 1997.
offences.offenceTitle: Stalking involving serious alarm / distress
offences.wording: XXXXxx between the 1st day of April 2023 and the 16th day of October 2023 pursued a course of conduct which amounted to stalking and caused AMEA CHITTY serious alarm or distress which had a substantial adverse effect on her usual day-to-day activities when he knew or ought to have known that his conduct would cause her such alarm or distress.

hearings.publicListNote: DEFENDANT TO BE PRODUCED. ALL COUNSEL TO ATTEND.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to sections 63(1), (7)(d) and 67(3) of the Criminal Justice and Immigration Act 2008.
offences.offenceTitle: Possess extreme pornographic image / images portraying an act of intercourse / oral sex with a dead / alive animal
offences.wording: XXXX on and before the 17th day of December 2021 at Canvey Island in the county of Essex possessed 26 extreme pornographic videos which were grossly offensive, disgusting or otherwise of an obscene character and portrayed in an explicit and realistic way a person performing an act of intercourse or oral sex with an animal.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.
offences.offenceTitle: Adult attempt to engage in sexual communication with a child
offences.wording: XXXX on the 10th day of December 2021 at Canvey Island in the county of Essex attempted to engage in sexual communication with a child under the age of 16 namely 13.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to sections 62(1) and 66(2) of the Coroners and Justice Act 2009.
offences.offenceTitle: Possess a prohibited image of a child
offences.wording: XXXX on and before the 17th day of December 2021 at Canvey Island in the county of Essex possessed 244 prohibited images and 6 prohibited videos of a child.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to sections 1(1)(a) and 6    of the Protection of Children Act 1978.
offences.offenceTitle: Make indecent photograph / pseudo-photograph of a    child
offences.wording: XXXX on or before the 17th day of December 2021 at Canvey Island in the county of Essex made 21 category C indecent photographs of a child.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.
offences.offenceTitle: Attempt to cause / incite a girl 13 to 15 to engage in sexual activity - offender 18 or over - penetration
offences.wording: XXXXXX between the 9th day of December 2021 and the 16th day of December 2021 at Canvey Island in the county of Essex attempted to incite a child under the age of 16 namely 13 to engage in sexual activity namely masturbation involving the penetration of her vagina.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.
offences.offenceTitle: Attempt to cause / incite a girl 13 to 15 to engage in sexual activity - offender 18 or over - penetration
offences.wording: XXXXX  between the 7th day of December 2021 and the 16th day of December 2021 at Canvey Island in the county of Essex attempted to incite a child under the age of 16 namely 14 to engage in sexual activity namely masturbation involving the penetration of her vagina.
